events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product is not what I paid for.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund based on the keywords found in the initial message regarding returning a wrong item.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily R. who specializes in refund and returns processing.
Hello! I’m Emily and I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and any relevant details about the wrong item?
Can you also send pictures of the item you received compared to what was supposed to arrive so we can process your refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I have attached photos showing the item I got versus the one I ordered. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and you may keep the incorrect item as a goodwill gesture.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate the option to keep the item and will wait for the payment confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should reflect in your bank account within a few days. Please contact us if you face any issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
I got the refund today. Thank you for handling this so efficiently. I am happy with the outcome.
We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for your patience, and we hope to serve you better next time.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you via email; we would appreciate your feedback on your support experience.
